attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the proposal to extend the time a suspected terrorist  can be held to 42 Days
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is far to an important decision to be left to politicians as they dont live in the real world, we are the people who have to live with these decisions, so we should have a say in if they are introduced or not

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Hold a referendum on the proposal to extend the time a suspected terrorist can be held to 42 Days."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20234


Prime Minister's Office
